page.title: 08A Day in my Life
page.content: On Tuesdays I get up at 7'o clock and pack my bag.After breakfast I bike to school.I start out at a quarter to nine.After assembly I go swimming with the rest of the class to Whitchurch swimming pool.I am in the top group.We practise for badges.When we arrive back at 11'00 am we work on our maths. From 12.00 _1.00 pm we have dinner and playtime.Sometimes I have school dinners and sometimes sandwiches.After dinner I learn spellings and tables for five minutes before sewing.From 2.15 pm to 2.30 pm I play in the play- ground with my friends. I do reading, handwriting or topic work until 3.30pm After school I play tennis for an hour before cycling just over a mile home.When I arrive home I read a book, have my tea,listen to my tapes and play with my sister.I go to bed at 9.00pm.
